channel.title: Developer on Second State News and Articles
channel.description: Recent content in Developer on Second State News and Articles

item.title: Ethereum Development A2Z| Smart Contract ABI
item.description: Learn Ethereum development and acquire complex technical concepts in a snap! Second State Inc is to release Ethereum development A2Z series articles to help you learn Ethereum in a short time starting from the basics, with real blockchain development cases. This article is to introduce Smart Contract ABI, the first piece in the series. Blockchain Smart Contract ABI is the interface between smart contracts and blockchain applications. After a smart contract is compiled into a binary file by a compiler like BUIDL, an ABI for this smart contract is automatically generated, recording the functions and parameters of the smart contract.

item.title: ETC 峰会回顾：未来可期
item.description: 声明：Second State赞助了今年的ETC峰会，并发布了ETC 版BUIDL IDE。有了BUIDL，即便是菜鸟开发者都可以在几分钟内在以太

item.title: What I learned from ETC Summit
item.description: Disclaimer: Second State sponsored this year’s ETC Summit and released the BUIDL for ETC IDE — even novice developers can now write and publish complete smart contract powered applications on the Ethereum Classic blockchain in minutes. Check out a tutorial! All views and opinions expressed in the article are my own. 中文版点击这里 Church & State Successful open source communities
